flawed_nl_solution:
If the art piece was bought at $4000, and its price in three years will be three times its buying price, it will be worth 3*$4000 = $10200 in another three years.
The price of the art piece will increase by $10200-$4000 = $<<10200-4000=6200>>6200

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12000, not 10200. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
